Class Container

  • java.lang.Object
    • Container

  • public class Container
extends java.lang.Object
    Container Model Object.

    Represents the enclosing box for the ball.

    Various attributes of the container, and related behavior.

      • collidesWith

        public boolean collidesWith(Ball ball)
        Apply collisions to the ball.

        Invokes reflectHorizontal() if ball is going outside the vertical boundaries of the container.

        Invokes reflectVertical() if ball is going outside the horizontal boundaries of the container.

        Parameters:
        ball - ball instance which is to be checked for collisions.
        Returns:
        true only if ball is outside bounds of the container.
